name: Hoist (Development Paused)
description:
Hoist is a platforming game inspired by metroidvania games. The game features a grappling hook and other climbing equipment to try and traverse the land. Your quest is to find your father in the underground

Modes Play Game

The default game mode is the story mode. The demo gives the player all items equipped from the beginning of the game. This mode features a save system, cutscenes and several areas to explore

Play Boss

This mode features a work in progress boss. The boss must be defeated by throwing back boulders at it, I wonder if theres a way to destroy the acorns?

Old Levels

The Old Levels mode is a collection of unused areas until the art and beginning of the game was done, there are various unused ideas such as reflections, larger areas and unused enemies.

Controls
  • LMB - Throw Rope/Collapse Rope/Throw Held Object
  • RMB (Hold) - Reel Rope
  • RMB(Release) - Collapse Rope
  • MMB - Climbing Spike
  • A,D - Move
  • S - Drop
  • Space - Jump
  • Shift - Boost
  • R - Restart Stage
  • Esc - Menu
